code: import{useState}from"react";import Particles from"react-particles";import{loadFireworksPreset}from"tsparticles-preset-fireworks";import{Typewriter}from"react-simple-typewriter";import Countdown from"react-countdown";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[newYearMessage,setNewYearMessage]=useState(["Bye 2023ðŸ‘‹"]);const particlesInit=async preset=>{await loadFireworksPreset(preset);};const timeLeft=()=>{const newYearDate=new Date("January 1, 2024 00:00:00").getTime();const now=new Date().getTime();const difference=newYearDate-now;return difference;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Particles,{init:particlesInit,options:{preset:"fireworks"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-center items-center min-h-screen flex-col gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-white font-bold text-4xl text-center px-4 z-50",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typewriter,{words:newYearMessage,loop:false,cursor:true,cursorStyle:"_",typeSpeed:70,deleteSpeed:50,delaySpeed:1000})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-white font-bold text-2xl z-50 ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Countdown,{date:Date.now()+timeLeft(),onComplete:()=>setNewYearMessage(["Selamat","Tahun","Baru","âœ¨HNY 2024âœ¨"])})})]})]});}export default App;
